events.description: Andrew McCutchen singles on a line drive to center fielder Cedric Mullins.
Bryan Reynolds singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Kyle Stowers. Andrew McCutchen to 3rd.

Pirates challenged (play at 1st), call on the field was overturned: Carlos Santana grounds into a force out, second baseman Adam Frazier to shortstop Joey Ortiz. Andrew McCutchen scores. Bryan Reynolds out at 2nd. Carlos Santana to 1st. 1 out
Jack Suwinski singles on a line drive to right fielder Kyle Stowers. Carlos Santana to 2nd.
